name: Log entries committed / s
description: This PromQL query measures the rate of Raft log operations committed, including all queue operations such as publishes and consumer acknowledgements. It tracks the progress of the Raft commit index on all members, including followers. RabbitMQ nodes without a Raft member running will not report any entries committed.
question: How many Raft log operations are committed per second?

name: Log entries committed / s
description: This PromQL query measures the rate of Raft log operations committed, including all queue operations such as publishes and consumer acknowledgements. It tracks the progress of the Raft commit index on all members, including followers. RabbitMQ nodes without a Raft member running will not report any entries committed.
question: What is the rate of publishes and consumer acknowledgements on the Raft commit index?

name: Log entries committed / s

It tracks the progress of the Raft commit index on all members, including followers. RabbitMQ nodes without a Raft member running will not report any entries committed.
question: Which members, including followers, are contributing to the rate of Raft log operations committed?

name: Log entry commit latency
description: The PromQL query measures the latency for a log entry to be written to a Raft log and that entry being committed.
question: What is the average commit latency for log entries in the Raft log?

name: Log entry commit latency
description: The PromQL query measures the latency for a log entry to be written to a Raft log and that entry being committed.
question: How does the commit latency change with increased system load?

name: Log entry commit latency
description: The PromQL query measures the latency for a log entry to be written to a Raft log and that entry being committed.
question: Is there a correlation between commit latency and system throughput?

name: Uncommitted log entries
description: This PromQL query measures the number of Raft log entries that have been written but not yet committed, which can indicate a lack of quorum among members affecting progress.
question: How many Raft log entries have been written but not committed?

name: Uncommitted log entries
description: This PromQL query measures the number of Raft log entries that have been written but not yet committed, which can indicate a lack of quorum among members affecting progress.
question: Is the number of uncommitted Raft log entries increasing over time?

name: Uncommitted log entries
description: This PromQL query measures the number of Raft log entries that have been written but not yet committed, which can indicate a lack of quorum among members affecting progress.
question: What does a high value of uncommitted Raft log entries suggest about member availability?

name: Leader elections / s
description: Measures the rate of Raft leader elections, tracking the increments of the Raft term.
question: What is the current rate of Raft leader elections?

name: Leader elections / s
description: Measures the rate of Raft leader elections, tracking the increments of the Raft term.
question: Are there any sustained non-zero rates of Raft leader elections?

name: Leader elections / s
description: Measures the rate of Raft leader elections, tracking the increments of the Raft term.
question: When should sustained high values of Raft leader elections be of concern?
